name: TestesTpsDrone
description:
An small scene with a flying drone player.

controls -->

mouse left or CTRL left: shoot

mouse right or left ALT: Aim

mouse scrool: change gun (4 guns avaliable for teste)

wasd or keyboard arrows:  move

Space bar (in ground): jump/ Space bar (in air):  fly

R: reload

left SHIFT:  run

***this is for portifolio and test purposes.***
